mapper.update: UPDATE EstadoEnvio SET descripcion = #{descripcion}, fecha = DATE(NOW()) WHERE idEnvio = #{idEstadoEnvio};
mapper.select: SELECT id as idEstadoEnvio, idEnvio, fecha, descripcion FROM EstadoEnvio WHERE idEnvio = #{idEnvio};

SELECT ev.id AS evId, ev.idOrigen AS evIdOrigen, ev.idDestino AS evIdDestino, ev.idCliente AS evIdCliente, ev.idConductor AS evIdConductor, ev.costo AS evCosto, ev.fecha AS evFecha, ev.numGuia AS evNumGuia, p.id AS personaId, p.nombre AS personaNombre, p.apellidoPaterno AS personaApellidoPaterno, p.apellidoMaterno AS personaApellidoMaterno, p.correo AS personaCorreo, p.foto AS personaFoto, p.CURP AS personaCURP, c.id AS clienteId, c.idPersona AS clienteIdPersona, c.telefono AS clienteTelefono, c.idDireccion AS clienteIdDireccion, do.id AS doId, do.calle AS doCalle, do.numero AS doNumero, do.colonia AS doColonia, do.ciudad AS doCiudad, do.estado AS doEstado, do.codigoPostal AS doCodigoPostal, dd.id AS ddId, dd.calle AS ddCalle, dd.numero AS ddNumero, dd.colonia AS ddColonia, dd.ciudad AS ddCiudad, dd.estado AS ddEstado, dd.codigoPostal AS ddCodigoPostal FROM Envio ev JOIN Cliente c ON ev.idCliente = c.id JOIN Persona p ON c.idPersona = p.id LEFT JOIN Direccion do ON ev.idOrigen = do.id LEFT JOIN Direccion dd ON ev.idDestino = dd.id WHERE ev.idConductor = #{id};
SELECT id, idEnvio, fecha, descripcion, estado FROM EstadoEnvio WHERE idEnvio = #{id};
